channel.title: Blogs on Zkynet.io
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Zkynet.io

item.title: A new website
item.description: This new website is largely thanks to Max Dima and Andrei. The Artwork Max Dima made all the artwork, his Illustrator skills are quite remarkable. He is responsible for websites like https://online.io and a few others that are in the making. His behance profile is also rather unique. The Code Andrei is responsible for the website it self. He is the CTO of Engage and works as a fullstack developer at Around25.

item.title: Zkynet.IO ?
item.description:
Zkynet is about all things computers and maybe, if we feel like it, we’ll write some stuff about it. If you need some help with your computer things, send us a message. Additionally, you can browse some of the tags below.
Love, Z.
